results.title: Loving Lebanon and Australia
results.creator_credit: Sam Haddad, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Lebanese immigrant Sam Haddad migrated to Australia he encountered ignorance and racism but via a well timed punch, he learned the value of mateship and tolerance and began to love his adopted country.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sam Haddad, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When Lebanese immigrant Sam Haddad migrated to Australia he encountered ignorance and racism but via a well timed punch, he learned the value of mateship and tolerance and began to love his adopted country.
description_for_label: When Lebanese immigrant Sam Haddad migrated to Australia he encountered ignorance and racism but via a well timed punch, he learned the value of mateship and tolerance and began to love his adopted country.

results.title: Time delay
results.brief_description: Newly wed Anne Hederics goes on a road trip across Australia with her husband Steve, while documenting their experiences through photo’s.

results.title: Margaret living with LAM
results.brief_description: Bernadette Wells recounts her sister Margaret’s battle with a rare lung disease called Lymphangioleimyomatosis (LAM). But mostly she pays tribute to Margaret’s unwavering dedication as a nurse. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria.
results.description: Bernadette Wells recounts her sister Margaret’s battle with a rare lung disease called Lymphangioleimyomatosis (LAM). But mostly she pays tribute to Margaret’s unwavering dedication as a nurse. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria.

results.title: A story about nan & pop
results.brief_description: Corey Kelly pays tribute to his nan and pop, who have had hard lives but have taught him the meaning of family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Koorie Heritage Trust Inc.

results.title: Memories of Mookie
results.brief_description: Ben Edwards remembers his cousin Mookie. He was his friend and his hero and he shouldn’t have died. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Koorie Heritage Trust Inc.

results.title: My car : my place
results.creator_credit: Bridget Nicholson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bridget Nicholson’s car represents many things to her. More than a way to get from A to B, her car is a private place, a safe place and has intensified the freedom of travel. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: Yellow gloves
results.creator_credit: Lyn Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Originally a city girl, Lyn Johnson wondered if she was cut out to be a farmers wife but a pair of yellow gloves changed everything. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lyn Johnson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Friendship in a biscuit tin
results.creator_credit: Vivianne Everett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Vivianne Everett pays homage to her friend Vikki who has taught her awareness and acceptance, while celebrating a life long friendship that has stood the test of time. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.

results.title: That dreaded phone call
results.creator_credit: Ruth Burleigh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ruth Burleigh reflects on the day she’ll have to make that dreaded call and put her beloved horse Boris ‘out to pasture’. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
